title: Interpretation of the dream of shaving one’s hair by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of shaving hair: Shaving hair in a dream is one of the dreams that carry a large number of interpretations that differ from man to woman. In the following paragraphs are all the interpretations explained by the leading interpretation scholars regarding the vision of shaving hair in a dream... So follow the interpretation of the dream of shaving hair. Shaving hair in a dream symbolizes Many good things are happening in the dreamer's life and the problems he feels will soon disappear. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has shaved his hair, this is an indication that the dreamer will get his share of a group of good things and the sadness and suffering he feels will go away. If he finds The dreamer himself smells his hair, then this is a sign that the dreamer will get his share of the goodness and benefits that he dreamed of, but after going through some problems that disturb his life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is shaving his hair and he is happy, then this is a new beginning that will occur in his life and it will be Very calm in the coming period. When a person sees that he is shaving his hair during Hajj, this is evidence of the fatigue that he feels due to the financial crises that he is exposed to in his life, and this makes him sad. But in a woman’s dream, the dream of shaving her hair is considered an unpleasant symbol that indicates that the dreamer faces many crises with... Her husband may lead to separation, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about shaving one’s hair by Ibn Sirin. Seeing shaved hair in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin symbolizes many different things that will come to the dreamer in his life, and God knows best. When a person dreams that he is shaving his hair, this is a sign that he will gain many pleasant things. And his life will be blessed. Seeing a sick person shaving his hair in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will improve his health and that the illness and pain he suffers from will subside. Shaving hair in a dream is a good thing and a good sign that the dreamer will get a lot of money soon. In case someone sees in If the dreamer finds that his hair has been shaved in a dream, this is a good omen that good things will come to him soon and he will be freed from the troubles caused by his enemies. As for the dreamer who shaves his hair In the winter, it symbolizes the bad period that he is going through at this time and that he is not satisfied with what is happening now. Shaving one’s hair in the summer is a blessing and something good will happen to the fortuneteller at a certain time, which will change the course of things. Shaving the beard in a dream Shaving the beard in a dream for Imam Al-Asimi indicates that The Lord - the Great and Great - will respond to the dreamer’s prayers and achieve what he desires in the coming period. If a person dreams that he shaves his beard and looks better, this is a good sign for others, and the best thing he sees. Interpretation of a dream about shaving hair for a single woman: Shaving hair in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the dreamer’s exposure More than one crisis makes her feel tired and sad, and she suffers from not ending yet. If a girl sees in a dream that she is shaving her hair, this is a sign that she is facing a health problem, but it may take a long time and she must be patient, respond to the request, and turn to God. A dream about shaving hair for a woman

title: Interpretation of five o'clock in a dream

preview.html: Let us learn more from our website explaining the presence of five o’clock in a dream and the special interpretations it includes for all people in the dream. Interpretation of observing five o’clock in a dream for a single girl When a single girl sees that she is telling someone that she is five years old, and talks about the hour and time. This single girl She is waiting for something. A lover will wait for her or move away from her, and God will bring her with him, God willing. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a watch, and she tries to change the time to five o’clock in the dream. This indicates that this girl will witness beautiful and happy days in the corresponding period and will have a relationship with God’s permission. God. But if a single girl dreams that someone gave her a wall clock as a gift, and the clock was five o’clock in the dream. This is an interpretation that this girl will be exposed to some health problems or that one of her relatives will be exposed to illness, and God knows best. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 71 in Dream Interpretation of watching five o’clock in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is buying a wall clock and it was five o’clock in the dream and she feels that she is late in the dream. This married dreamer will face challenges and financial difficulties, but God Almighty will save her in her life. And when the married woman saw that he was holding a watch in his hand, her husband gave her And the time at that time was five in the morning. This dream indicates the amount of love and tenderness between her and her husband, and God will make them happy in the coming days, and goodness will come, God willing. And if a married woman sees in a dream that she wants to set the clock at five in the evening in the dream. This A married woman seeks to make her children happy, and tries to protect them from everything, and God will make her happy with them, God willing. Interpretation of seeing 5 o’clock in a dream for a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees that she has a beautiful, new watch in her hands and the time at that time is 5 pm and she is happy. This divorced dreamer who had This dream is that she is about to do a lot of good and witness a transformation in her life, and God knows best. But if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is carrying a broken wall clock, and the boat is lost except for the number 5 in the dream. This divorced woman will find someone who will change her life very soon and help her and compensate her with goodness. God willing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the number 70 in a dream and what the number 70 shows. Interpretation of seeing the clock at 5 in a dream about the man and its meaning. If the man sees that a beautiful and happy woman is giving him a wall clock, and the clock is 5 in the dream and she is happy. Because this dreamer will be given by God a woman who will fill his house and make His days are happy, and his next life and his righteousness will come into her hands, God willing. But whoever sees that someone has given him an arm, and it was 5 o’clock at that time of the dream. This dreamer will be exposed to a loss that may be a person or money, and he must be careful in the coming period. If he sees The man is telling someone that it is five o’clock now, and he is talking about time and time. This man is witnessing prosperity and transition in his life and achieving what he was striving for, God willing, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing the

title: Interpretation of a dream in which a man informed a married woman of seeing a penis in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the vision of a man’s penis for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman who dreamed of my husband’s penis, interpretation of playing with the penis, the meaning of sucking and licking the penis. Interpretation of a dream about a man’s penis. Violating or playing with others suggests that you are benefiting from this person with something or that you need it, and the feeling that you are inevitable, may indicate Something that is not clear or goes against your beliefs and principles. If you see your son’s penis being cut off, it may mean that he has no male brothers, which means that they will follow him. It can also be interpreted as a father’s journey. If you see that your husband’s penis is very long, then this dream indicates travel or estrangement, and seeing the male long in the way you mentioned, it either raises his status and spreads his report, or indicates his concerns. Spirits. If you dream that your husband’s penis is cut off, this may indicate his trip or the trip of one of his children or the boycott of his family. If a woman dreams that she has a protruding penis and it is attached to it, this means that the woman who saw that she had a protruding penis indicates that she will not give birth in the future. The protrusion of the penis may indicate the high status of her children. Seeing a woman having a penis like a man, this indicates a boy if she is pregnant, and if she is not pregnant, and if she has a son, he will be a master in his family. As for sucking the penis, it is good for the breastfeeding and breastfeeding woman, and the goodness will be achieved and the need will be satisfied. Whoever dreams that his memory is long and growing, it is a sign of a lot of children and money. Seeing a man’s status is a sign of activity, seriousness, and fulfillment of his needs. Seeing the loss of a male indicates the loss of a boy or the death of a sick and isolated man. Seeing yourself carrying another person’s male is a sign that you will gain money in addition to Your position: Seeing yourself leaning towards the male and sucking it is a sign of surrender to boys. To dream of cutting off your penis indicates death, money that goes, or a long-term estrangement. Seeing a human being with two males means that he will give birth to two sons. Seeing one biting the other is a sign of exaggerated praise. Seeing the hot loaf coming out of the male. A sign of poverty - seeing a woman as if she has a penis like men, so if she is pregnant she will give birth to a boy, and if she is not pregnant and gives birth, his family will give birth to him. Seeing wounds on the penis is a sign of a bad conversation that harms your reputation. Seeing that someone has touched your penis indicates joy and pleasure. Seeing a man’s penis in a dream says Dream interpretation scholars say that if one sees in a dream that he is playing in the memory of another person he knows, this means that this person is in great need and distress and this person needs someone to help him or that this person will soon do something that conflicts with his personal principles and beliefs if he is not satisfied. About this act. But if one sees in a dream that the penis is very large, it means that this person will travel to a country and this person will be isolated in vain. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s penis Ibn Sirin says that seeing a man’s penis in a dream means money and a long life, but if he sees If a person dreams that his penis is cut off, this means that that person will lose one of his children or that this person will lose him. He cuts off his family and stays away from them if the man is sick

title: Interpretation of a marriage or engagement proposal in a dream for a single, married and pregnant girl

preview.html: Seeing the engagement of an unmarried girl married to a pregnant woman from a known or unknown person. I dreamed of someone asking for my hand and a vision of the groom’s rejection by Ibn Sirin. Seeing an unmarried woman marrying her indicates more than one meaning and connotation. A girl seeing this dream in a dream may be the result of her thinking about matters of marriage and the characteristics of the dream knight whom she wants to marry. Or that this girl rejects many young men who want to propose to her and marry her. There is another indication that this dream may indicate the presence of a young man who loves this girl. Indeed, he wishes this girl to be his wife, but he is not convinced, or he does not feel it, or he does not want that. Because he is not the knight of her dreams. Seeing a girl who refuses engagement or refuses to accept a young man’s request to propose to her in a dream indicates the appearance of happy news in her life and the introduction of a suitable young man to her, with whom she will become engaged. In fact, something that will bring joy and happiness to her and her family. In general, seeing someone proposing an engagement or marriage in a single girl’s dream is a reason for optimism and happy news, and the happy news will happen soon, God willing. As for seeing a married woman as a man who is a stranger to her and she does not know about her engagement Marrying her is something that calls for happiness and good news, because it portends age and longevity. Between a married woman and her husband and happiness in that marriage. Seeing a married woman as if she had intercourse with men other than her husband, indicates men who will participate with her husband in a business or trade that will bring money, benefits, and interests to the family. Seeing a marriage proposal may indicate the presence of crises and problems in the life of the viewer, Whereas a married woman seeing a man asking her to marry him in a dream may indicate a lack of trust in her husband and his weakness in assuming responsibility and proper management of the home. Therefore, this vision is a reflection of the psychological state that this person is going through. There is another interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl getting married in... In a dream, it indicates that this girl is going through puberty and is dealing with issues of marriage and love. Interpretation of seeing a woman’s engagement in a dream - YouTube

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about running for a single woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about running in a dream for a single woman. Have you ever woken up during your sleep and gasped from running in a dream? Many of us want to see running in a dream in which the dreamer sees himself running in a dream. He could be on a road or in a fight, or he is escaping. Of something unknown and a feeling of fear, and in the interpretation of this dream, the jurists put forward hundreds of interpretations, and different combinations that combine good and evil, especially in one dream, and in the lines of this article we will refer to them in detail according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams for running in a dream for a single woman. Scientists provide hundreds Different interpretations of the interpretation of running in one dream, and we find the following: Interpretation of a dream of running in a dream for a single woman generally indicates achieving goals and achieving ambitions. Running in a girl’s dream indicates her promotion at work and her reaching an important position. Whereas if the dreamer saw that he was running in a dream And he is afraid, this may symbolize anxiety and psychological disorder. Fam Al-Osaimi warns that she will witness a fall while running in a girl’s dream, as it may foretell that she will be exposed to betrayal and treachery. Running in fear in anyone’s dream is an indication that you are making a random decision and do not slow down to think Whoever sees in her dream that she is running after a car, she is seeking to fulfill a difficult desire and she must adhere to her determination and not despair. Running after a child in a dream symbolizes the innocence, spontaneity and purity of the dreamer’s soul. Interpretation of a dream about running in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the interpretation of the dream of running. A single woman has different meanings, including desirable and generally harmless, as we will see as follows: Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of athletic running in a person’s dream as a sign of good health and the body’s safety from disease. If the viewer is a student studying and sees in her dream that she is running, she will feel pressure. Psychological and tension due to upcoming exams. The interpretation of a dream about running in a dream for a single woman may reflect her desire to get rid of negative energy or pent-up emotions. Interpretation of a dream about running on the road for single women: Jogging or jogging is a type of useful sport, but what about the interpretation of a dream about running on the road for individuals? Seeing single women running in the street after someone in a dream means that this person will help her achieve her goals. If a girl sees that she is running on the road from a predator such as a lion or a bull, this indicates a person with a bad character and a bad reputation who is pursuing her and approaching her against her will. The interpretation of a dream about running on the road for single women is a sign of overcoming difficulties and obstacles in their path. Running aimlessly in the street in a girl’s dream symbolizes fun, happiness, and the appearance of pleasant occasions. Seeing the dreamer running on the road in a dream indicates a love of adventure and departure from the traditional pattern and routine. Interpretation of a dream about running in the rain for a single woman. Scientists convey good news to the girl who dreams that she is running in the rain with good associations that reassure her and give her a feeling of happiness and calm, as is evident from the following: Interpretation of a dream about running in the rain for single women portends a

title: Interpretation of a dream about a washing machine: Seeing a washing machine in a dream

preview.html: A washing machine in a dream indicates purity, innocence, and other interpretations that we mention for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as burning an old washing machine. , or to operate the washing machine, to spread clothes on the line, to steal the washing machine, to break down the washing machine, to repair it and many others according to the great Arabic dream interpreter Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi: Interpretation of the washing machine in a dream Seeing a washing machine in a dream means purity, cleanliness, atonement for sins, removal of worries, and recovery from illness. A washing machine can indicate The good condition of the dreamer or the people of the place where he was seen or good news about their good condition. God Almighty said: {O you shroud, arise and warn, and your Lord, raise it up as your garment, then purify it (), and the dust, then leave it ()} (Al-Muddaththir). A washing machine for one man and one woman. Because it has a dress inside it, and a dress in a dream is a wedding. A modern or sophisticated washing machine in a dream can indicate comfort or luxury and bliss. A washing machine refers to rotating devices such as a propeller, an airplane engine, and the like because of the similarity between them. title: Interpretation of seeing climbing a mountain in a dream for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of climbing a mountain in a dream for single, pregnant and married women. Mountaineering is a difficult task that requires a lot of strength, concentration, patience and courage to do things that seemed deadly to ordinary people. Some people see in their dreams that they are climbing a mountain or a height, and many scary things happened in the dream, such as a person falling from a height or being injured, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of climbing a mountain. A mountain in a dream for single, pregnant and married women. Interpretation of a dream in which you see climbing a mountain in a dream. Dream interpreters have indicated that seeing a mountain climber in a dream expresses the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life who seek to harm him, and this vision shows victory over them in reality, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that He climbed a mountain in a dream and saw water on its summit. This vision indicates goodness and livelihood represented by the acquisition of money. However, if he finds food, this vision means his marriage to a woman with good morals. But if the dreamer dreams that he is carrying a container of water with him while climbing a mountain, then this vision symbolizes piety, guidance, and good luck. If the mountain that the dreamer is climbing in the dream is Mount Arafat, then this vision shows understanding in religion. But if you see a mountain climbing mountains, then Descending from it in a dream, this means that the dreamer was able to achieve tremendous success in achieving the goals he pursues on earth. If the dreamer climbs to the top of the mountain and finds a lot of lava on it, then this vision is repulsive and indicates that the dreamer is going through crises in reality. Seeing a sick person He climbs a mountain in a dream, good news for his recovery from his illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing climbing a mountain in a dream for a single woman. As for an unmarried girl, this vision is a praiseworthy dream for her, and it means goodness, life, and happiness for her. If a single woman dreams that she is trying to climb to the top of the mountain This vision shows the efforts she is making to achieve what she wants. If an unmarried girl sees that she is climbing a mountain with difficulty, this vision symbolizes that she is not achieving what she desires in reality, and this vision shows her separation from her partner, and God knows best. In the case of descending from the mountain in In a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer will face conflicts with those close to her. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a mountain for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, if she sees that she is climbing the mountain easily, then this vision is only an indication of the ease of the dreamer’s circumstances. In the case of climbing A green mountain in a dream: This vision is one of the dreamer’s praiseworthy dreams, as it indicates the stability of her marital life and the end of her problems with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about seeing climbing a mountain in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman climbing a mountain to its summit shows the high status she enjoys in reality and it is also a sign To overcome difficulties. In the case of descending from a mountain in a dream, this vision indicates comfort, and God knows best. Dreams generally occur more in women than in men, because they hide many thoughts and feelings and

title: Interpretation of a dream about my lover coming to propose to me

preview.html: As the dream indicates that her engagement date is approaching at this time, the dream indicates that goodness is coming to her and she will live happily. Interpretation of seeing my beloved come to propose marriage to a girl in a dreamAlso, an unmarried woman seeing in a dream that she is waiting for her lover while she is being proposed by her family in a dream. A sign However, she is currently living a period full of love and wants to marry him. She also announces the date of her approaching marriage, God willing, to a person known and acceptable to her. She also indicates that seeing an unmarried woman asking her fiancé to dream of her engagement. This is evidence of her fear of God, and that she does not She does heinous things and wants to do what is right for her. She indicates that she is trying not to exceed God’s limits in her relationship with this person in her life. If she sees her lover awake, she comes in a dream for her father to propose to her in a dream. She explains that this person is good and really wants to marry her, And that she is waiting for him, and God knows best. Another interpretation is that he is thinking a lot about the matter and wants it to happen quickly. See also: Interpretation of dreams about entering the house of a lover for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing my beloved coming to propose to me in a dream with a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman waiting for her lover to propose to her in a dream from her father. A sign of her desire. She is very keen on marriage at this time and she is striving to achieve that. If a divorced woman sees a stranger that she loves him, then he dreams of her engagement. He declares that he will live a happy life free of misery, fatigue and problems, God willing. It also suggests that she will live quietly after her complete separation from her ex-husband, and God knows best. She is divorced. Who asks her fiancé to come to her house and propose to her from her family while she is dreaming. This is explained by the fact that he wants to enter into a legal marriage and does not want to commit a crime. Interpretation of seeing my lover in our house. Likewise, a pregnant woman who sees in a dream that her lover was sitting in her house next to her husband A sign that she is thinking a lot about giving birth to a boy, and wants that to happen. It also indicates that a married woman dreams of seeing her lover in her home and he was talking to her. An indication of her intense desire and love for her husband, and that she is protecting him and he is protecting her feelings. A divorced woman who asks her lover in a dream to He comes to her house and she rejoices. She explains that she will already be in a wonderful love story at this stage of her life. Either the unmarried woman who sees her lover in a dream, and she was dreaming inside her house, and sitting with him. An indication of the happy life that she will see, God willing, and live in this era. As It indicates that seeing my beloved in our house is an indication of the dreamer’s distance from sins and immorality. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the return of a lover after separation. Interpretation of dreams about the engagement of a single woman by her old lover. Seeing an unmarried woman being propositioned by her old lover and she refuses, this indicates a lack of desire to That is. If she sees her old lover sitting for her engagement, it makes clear that she is living in conflict with her feelings. Likewise, an unmarried woman who wants her old lover to be engaged shows her great love for him, and God knows best. It appears that the single woman wants her old fiancé to propose to her, so she explains Her desire to marry him. He points out

title: The 12 most famous interpretations of seeing flour in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing palm flour in a dream? An indication of the good lineage of visions. The interpretation of seeing flour in an individual’s dream? Evidence of scientific excellence. What is the interpretation of a married woman collecting flour in bags? It indicates a good future and the goodness that she will obtain. Interpretation of a married man’s vision In a dream? It indicates the provision of children and the soon pregnancy of his wife. What is the interpretation of seeing flour in a girl’s dream? Evidence of a new job that she will get. Interpretation of a dream about flour by Ibn Sirin: To see a person in a dream that he is sifting flour with a sieve, this indicates the hard work that he does. Then Sifting flour in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s good lineage. Flour in a dream indicates halal money. Then whoever sees in his dream that he is selling flour, this indicates that he does not care about the afterlife, and is attracted to worldly pleasures. Then seeing rice flour in a dream is an indication On earning money and livelihood, but after hardships. If a person sees in his dream that he is eating flour, this indicates poverty. Interpretation of a dream about flour for a single woman: Seeing flour in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of academic excellence. Then, seeing a girl in a dream sifting semolina flour, This indicates kindness and good news about marriage in the near future. Then seeing flour in a girl’s dream indicates marriage to a rich man. Flour in a girl’s dream indicates a new job that she will find. Flour in a dream for a single girl is evidence of the success and excellence that will be in her life. Dream Married woman exactly: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is carrying a large and heavy amount of flour, this indicates kindness and abundance of sustenance. Flour in a married woman’s dream indicates stability in married life. Then if he sees in a dream that he is kneading flour to prepare food from it, this is a good sign. Then, if a married woman sees that she is collecting flour in bags, this indicates her good future and the goodness that she will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about flour for a pregnant woman. Flour in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the safety of the fetus. If a pregnant woman sees that she is sifting flour, this indicates the birth of a healthy child. Then seeing flour mixed with water is evidence of easy access to childbirth and it will pass without pain. Then seeing a married woman a bag of flour is evidence of the presence of a male child. Interpretation of a dream about an expensive man: For a man, flour in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that he will obtain from trade. Then seeing Selling flour is evidence of his interest in the world and forgetting the afterlife. Seeing a married man in a dream means that he will have children and that his wife will become pregnant soon. Then, seeing palm trees made of flour in a man’s dream indicates good deeds that the dreamer has done. Seeing flour without impurity is a sign of marriage if The man was single. Flour indicates good news.

title: Interpretation of a married woman’s marriage in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you in detail the interpretation of a married woman’s marriage in a dream, Fahd Al-Osaimi. Marriage is a close relationship that connects two parties who combine affection and compassion in this relationship. A woman may see in her dream that she is marrying a man she does not know, or she may see that she is marrying her husband and is surprised. Through the following encyclopedia, you can determine the meaning of this dream in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of a married woman’s marriage in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi. Dr. Fahd Al-Osaimi explained that seeing a married woman in her dream has many connotations. If a married woman sees that she is marrying a man she knows, and this man is not her husband, then this is a vision. She is worthy of praise and shows many good deeds in her life, and this conveys good news to her husband that he will receive widespread nourishment in the coming period. If a married woman has a son and sees in her dream that he is getting married, this is evidence of the approaching date of her son’s marriage. If a married woman sees in her dream that she If a married pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is marrying someone other than her husband, this is a sign that God will give birth to a male for her, and this vision brings It has good tidings of an easy and trouble-free birth. If a married woman sees that she is marrying a famous person with a good reputation in society, this is a sign that she will become pregnant and give birth to a child who will establish a great relationship in the future. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying another manIf a married woman sees in her dream that she is getting married From another man, this is a vision that bodes well for her. Seeing a married woman wearing a wedding dress in her dream has good connotations and portends a change in her circumstances for the better, and this vision may indicate the excellence of students in school. If the woman who sees the dream is suffering from an illness and dreams of marrying a man Another, this is an unpleasant vision and indicates the deterioration of her health condition. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying a man of great status, then this is a vision that promises her the achievement of the goals she seeks. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying her husbandIf a married woman sees in her dream that she is getting married again This is a good vision and its meaning is good. Marrying the husband again indicates the presence of love, tenderness and understanding between the dreamer and her husband, and this vision also indicates the stability of the family. Seeing a married woman marrying her husband indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better, and this vision may indicate the dreamer’s travel. With her husband in the near future. If the dreamer is married to a merchant and she sees in her dream that she is marrying him again, this is a good vision that foretells her that her husband will make a large profit from his trade in the long season. Seeing a married woman being married by her husband again indicates that the husband will be promoted to the position Whoever occupies it.Interpretation of dreams for a married woman marrying someone she knows. Seeing a married woman marrying a man she knows, and this man has an excellent status, this is a good vision that shows the arrival of goodness to her home, and this vision also shows settled
